casebody.data:
Edward J. DAVIS, Petitioner, Appellant, v. Sidney J. KAGAN, Trustee, Respondent, Appellee. No, 4956. United States Court of Appeals First Circuit. June 13, 1955. Edward J. Davis, Boston, Mass., pro se. Sidney J. Kagan, Boston, Mass., for appellee.

Before MAGRUDER, Chief Judge, and WOODBURY and HARTIGAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The order of the District Court is affirmed.
